Title: Repeals congestion pricing
LawCode: Rpld Art 44-C, amd §1630, V & T L; rpld §553 sub 9 ¶(s) & sub 12-a, §§553-j & 553-k, amd §566-a, Pub Auth L; rpld §87 sub 2 ¶(p), Pub Off L; rpld Part ZZZ Subpart A §§9 - 11, Chap 59 of 2019; rpld §606 sub (jjj), Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public authorities law, in relation to congestion pricing in New York City, and repealing certain provisions of the vehicle and traffic law, the public authorities law, the public officers law, the tax law, and subpart A of part ZZZ of chapter 59 of the laws of 2019, amending the vehicle and traffic law and the public authorities law relating to establishing a central business district tolling program in the city of New York and amending the public officers law relating to confidentiality of certain public records, relating thereto
